job.command: starver SL14a cons root4star -q -b macros/makeBES11.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}\",9,250000,2,0,15\)++ >& AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}.log mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent0.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent0/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent1.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent1/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent2.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent2/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent3.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent3/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent4.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent4/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent5.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent5/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent6.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent6/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent7.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent7/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}_Cent8.root /gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/scratch/jlidrych/BES/11/Cent8/ mv AuAu11GeV_KaonDST_${JOBID}*.log /star/data01/pwg/jlidrych/vypisy/picoDST/
